root.name: Chaos Chronicles
root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP (SP2), Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8Processor: Core 2 Duo Processor (1.8 GHz or better) or similar AMDMemory: 2 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 3 GB HD SpaceVideo Card: Shader 3.0 compatible graphics card (Ati 2600, Geforce 8800 or similar) with 512 MB RAMSound: DirectX Compatible Sound CardRecommendedProcessor: i5 Processor (2.4 GHz or better) or similar AMDMemory: 4 GB RAM or moreVideo Card: Shader 3.0 compatible graphics card (Ati 5850 and Geforce 460 or better) with 768 MB RAM
